package.name: cross-linux-headers
package.unpack: major=` echo $PKGVERSION | awk -F '.' '{print $1}' ` minor=` echo $PKGVERSION | awk -F '.' '{print $2}' ` unxz -c ${SRCDIR}/linux-${major}.${minor}.tar.xz | tar xf -
package.install:
cd linux-${PKGVERSION} make INSTALL_HDR_PATH=dest headers_install find dest/include \( -name .install -o -name ..install.cmd \) -delete
for tgt in crosstools/i486-linux-uclibc crosstools-amd64/amd64-linux-uclibc \ crosstools-ia32-musl/i386-linux-musl crosstools-amd64-musl/x86_64-linux-musl ; do mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/local/${tgt}/include cp -rv dest/include/* ${TGTDIR}/usr/local/${tgt}/include ln -s . ${TGTDIR}/usr/local/${tgt}/usr done
